name: Tiki-Taki-Toei
description:
A game made for Mini Jam 108 - Seaside

This game was made to practice my terrible art skill, UI placement skill and Music system.

P.S This is a Tic-Tac-Toe game, and it's pretty bad and no AI :P

Special Thanks:

For the Tic-Tac-Toe and Sound Management Tutorial
https://www.youtube.com/c/DCRKev

For the Music
https://opengameart.org/users/fantasy-musica
https://opengameart.org/users/hitctrl

For the Sound Effects
https://opengameart.org/users/nenadsimic
https://opengameart.org/users/qubodup

And here are the list of things that I couldn't add to the game.

#1 Tikis - so why is this called Tiki in the title when there are no Tiki's :(
#2 Coconut Trees - cause beach have coconut trees right? or is it just me?
#3 Sea waves - Umm about that it's pretty hard to animate and I did do the Sea to Sand wave. 
#4 Volcano - who doesn't like volcano in a Tiki Island, unfortunately I couldn't add the Tiki so no Volcano too.
#5 Robots - I couldn't add the AI so I also couldn't add the robot.
